t: Watch Clarkson's Farm – Season 1 | Prime Video

t: How agroforestry can restore degraded lands and provide income in the Amazon
s: February 2, 2023 - NOVA CALIFÓRNIA, Brazil — Hamilton Condack smiles and points to a towering ipê tree rooted in the plot of land where he lives and produces food. “When I first got this place 15 years ago, a guy offered me R$500 [ ] for it,” he said of the ipê, one of the Amazon’s most valuable hardwoods, ...
